rules_text:
When Crystal Voice enters, create two 1/1 black Cat Spirit creature tokens.
Team [i](Cast either side or both.When you cast both, the back is a token. Tokens don't have signatures.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Trample, haste
Whenever another creature enters under your control, Crystal Drums gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]When Crystal Music plays, the earth shakes and the dark spirits of Kerovotz buy tickets.[/i]
